Victor

Welcome, my name is Victor and I am currently a fourth-year computer engineering student at the Universoty of Florida.

<

Daniel

I was born in Lima, Peru and lived there for 7 years before my family came to the United States. Back in Peru, most people went by their middle name; so it was quite an adjustment being called from Daniel to Victor.

Hu

My parents are from Guangzhou, China and I am a the first in my family to attend college. I work hard every day in order to achieve a successful future and thank my parents for their sacrifices.
